verses.text: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
Dominion and fear \add are\add* with him, He maketh peace in his high places.
Is there \add any\add* number of his armies? And upon whom doth not his light arise?
How then can man be justified with God? Or how can he be clean \add that is\add* born of a woman?
Behold \add even\add* to the moon, and it shineth not; Yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.
How much less man, \add that is\add* a worm? And the son of man, \add which is\add* a worm?
